original_text: “To evaluate a person’s work or their productivity requires three things: 1. To be an expert in what they do; 2. To have absolutely no reason to care whether they succeed or not; 3. To have time available to evaluate them.” -Jeff Leek ( http://t.cn/RU0tqOC )
